main event: An oval-shaped object with dull yellow lights was observed hovering just above the horizon, changing colors from red to yellow-orange and then to blue-green.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 11 minutes,The object was initially seen as a red glow at about 10 degrees above the horizon,The object's flight path was directly away from the observers and it appeared stationary for part of the sighting,No unusual meteorological or astronomical conditions were reported,The sighting was made by a group of six enlisted military personnel.
sighted object: oval-shaped object with dull yellow lights
witness description: military personnel enlisted in the Army
